title: Happy Valley: A Southern Country Novel
description: A year ago, Jo Preston was released and sent home from a mental institution. She has only vague memories of why she had been committed. Circumstances beyond her control will cause those memories to surface, one by one.A tragedy, brought on by deceit, leaves her heartbroken and rejected. She is sent away to live with some rather peculiar relatives. Her fear of being institutionalized again has her desperate to keep her past hidden, but how long can she keep it a secret when her imagination begins playing tricks on her... or is it? A voice from her past resurfaces as well as the man who wants her secret to die with her. This is a story about a young girl's heartbreak, rejection, fear, faith, and determination.Happy Valley is the first in the series of A Southern Country Novel.
author: Diana   Anderson
